com.guoku.guokuv4.base

类 BaseActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Activity
      • android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
        • com.guoku.guokuv4.base.BaseActivity
  • 直接已知子类:
    CategoryListAct, NavigationActivity, NetWorkActivity, PhotoViewAct, SearchAct, UserBaseFrament, WebAct

    public abstract class BaseActivity
extends android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
    基类activity 每一个acitivty都要继承该类
